main event: One round bright white light the size of a dime was seen descending in the west for 1 hour 15 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour 15 minutes,The object was described as a round bright white light,The sighting occurred on November 10, 1957,The location of the sighting was Bellefontaine AFB, Ohio,It was concluded that the sighting was likely Venus.
